meanings.sent1: The presoaked sponge was ready for cleaning the dishes.
meanings.sent2: She used presoaked seeds to ensure they would sprout quickly.
meanings.sent3: The presoaked towel was so wet, it felt like a heavy blanket.
meanings.sent4: His presoaked clothes clung to his skin like a second layer.
meanings.sent5: The presoaked wood absorbed the paint easily, creating a smooth finish.

meanings.definition: Having been immersed in liquid before use
meanings.sent1: The presoaked fabric was perfect for making tie-dye shirts.
meanings.sent2: The presoaked beans cooked faster than the dry ones.
meanings.sent3: She handed him the presoaked sponge, joking that it had a head start.
meanings.sent4: The presoaked paper became fragile and tore easily.
meanings.sent5: The presoaked noodles absorbed the flavors of the broth beautifully.
